Articles.Content:
Space-Ballz is a server, we are opening to the public to play on. It is a semi-serious group of role-play gamers that like to immerse themselves into the game. We invite all Kerbal fans to visit and play the server. As a group of experienced mature gamers, this is only one of our multiple servers we have built and ran over the years and we are looking to expand into kerbal full time.

However as New Kerbalnauts we still have a few ditches to leap over to allow the public to easily find and join the server on a good, secure connection. We will be doing alot of custom programming to allow for a more interactive experience. Look for more post in the future. We are glad to join the community on this forum and hope you are glad to have us as well.

Hi MajorB,

Perhaps you could help us out. It's not completely clear what the aim of your post is. Are you looking for people to do multiplayer KSP with? Or are you looking for some sort of role-play? Or is it something else entirely? (We're trying to figure out where to put your post.)

Welcome to the forums!

Cheers,

~Claw
why is this in forum games? what is it a server on? do you even IPs?
Yeah, I'm pretty sure this doesn't belong in Forum Games.
i think this is an attempt at advertising?
